welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Konz, known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal of Findel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newly built terminal dedicated to cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bitburg Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
